snippet.title: Where's Samantha? Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Your true love, Samantha, has vanished! You’ll need to travel a strange realm fraught with traps and puzzles and collectibles in order to find her. Lost love, perilous obstacles, and wool – the cornerstones of any great adventure! From ROKiT Games and Respect Studios comes a platformer for all!

Find us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1497630/Wheres_Samantha/

Follow us for updates:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wheressamantha
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/wheresamantha
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wheressamanthagame/
